department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: female figure in red sari balancing terracotta vase on head with PR hand, and holding PL hand to forehead; woman is standing on sand against a painted backdrop of a bay with trees and mountains
portfolio: From Native Women of South India: Manners and Customs Series

title: Returning from the Tank
